plugin.name: Generic2D
plugin.description: SeisComP travel time wrapper for Generic2D travel time tables.

struct.description: Defines a travel time profile using Generic2D travel time tables. Once defined, the profile can be enabled by adding its name to the 'ttt.Generic2D.tables' list.

parameter.name: tablePath
parameter.description: Path to the directory containing the Generic2D travel time table files, and the base name of the table files. For example, if your files are located at /path/to/ttt/model*csv, then tablePath should be /path/to/ttt/model.
